channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: USPS shakeup could mean higher shipping costs for consumers
item.description: The change comes as the busy holiday shipping season approaches.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: GameStop, Viking Therapeutics, Trump Media and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: The stock market is now hinting it believes the Fed has committed an error
California wildfires have already burned three times as many acres compared to all of 2023—and it’s about to get so much worse
item.description: Firefighters are using bulldozers, helicopters, and planes to control the rapidly spreading fires.

item.title: This government-backed startup is growing blood to help fight shortages
item.description: Safi Biotherapeutics, a government-backed startup, is growing blood in a lab to help fight shortages.

item.title: Good inflation news for consumers: Experts say companies have quit price gouging
Americans lost $5.6 billion to cryptocurrency fraud scams last year
item.description: FBI says that’s 45% more than in 2022.

item.title: Trading the election: Watch these pro-Harris stocks as her odds rise following the debate
item.description: These stocks could benefit if Harris' debate performance helps leads to a victory in the November general election.

item.title: Trump social-media stock ‘DJT’ notches postmerger low after presidential debate
A veteran CIA officer reached up a colleague’s skirt and forcibly kissed her in front of co-workers, prosecutors allege in sexual misconduct case
item.description: A 648-page internal watchdog report found systemic shortcomings in the CIA’s handling of such complaints.

item.title: Here's the inflation breakdown for August 2024 — in one chart
item.description: The consumer price index rose by 2.5% in August, on an annual basis. It was the lowest reading since February 2021.

item.title: Dow drops below key technical level after CPI report — live coverage
After 155 years, Campbell’s is dropping ‘soup’ from its name
item.description: It won’t stop making its flagship product, though.

item.title: Solar stocks gain as Wall Street says Harris won the debate against Trump
item.description: The Invesco Solar ETF and the iShare Global Clean Energy ETF gained more than 2% in early trading.

item.title: Need to Know: This strategist thinks earnings estimates are overshooting by 30%
